column6: MOST DANGEROUS GAME PART 1 Longshot has survived longest on the ultimate reality game show and the X-Men are sent to rescue him-until they become part of the game themselves.
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | penciller (cover):Andy Kubert | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
